name: aviary-tokens
description: Design tokens for the Fullscript Aviary design system

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn transform && yarn build:tokens && yarn build:types && yarn build:babel
scripts.transform: yarn transform-core-light && yarn transform-core-dark && yarn transform-core-emerson && yarn transform-light && yarn transform-dark && yarn transform-emerson && yarn transform-primitives
scripts.transform-light: yarn token-transformer src/data src/transformed/transformed-light.json core-light,light core-light --expandShadow
scripts.transform-dark: yarn token-transformer src/data src/transformed/transformed-dark.json core-dark,dark core-dark --expandShadow
scripts.transform-emerson: yarn token-transformer src/data src/transformed/transformed-emerson.json core-emerson,emerson core-emerson --expandShadow
